name: Shieldon
description: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP.  Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold.  If this Pokémon is holding a focus sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to moves flagged as being sound-based.  heal bell is unaffected.  uproar still prevents this Pokémon from sleeping.  This Pokémon can still receive a Perish Song counter through baton pass, and will retain a Perish Song counter if it acquires this ability after Perish Song is used.  howl, roar of time, sonic boom, and yawn are not flagged as sound-based.
